title: Set notifications dropdown background colors for light/dark mode

requirements.text: Update the notifications dropdown panel background so that it is #1a1a1a in dark mode and white (#ffffff) in light mode, applying the change only to the notifications dropdown surface (not the bell trigger button and not other dropdowns).

quotes: notifications bar Dropdown ka background color: #1a1a1a ... dark mood aur light mood ke liye light color

acceptanceCriteria: When the app theme is dark, the Notifications dropdown panel surface (DropdownMenuContent and its internal panel areas) renders with background #1a1a1a.
When the app theme is light, the Notifications dropdown panel surface renders with background #ffffff.
No other dropdown menus/components have their background colors changed as part of this update.
There are no hardcoded inline backgroundColor styles left that force #1a1a1a in light mode inside the notifications dropdown.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Keep changes limited to the notifications dropdown; do not alter global theme tokens in a way that affects other popovers/dropdowns.
nonGoals: Changing hover/focus colors beyond what is required to support the requested background colors.
Updating the profile menu dropdown or mobile search dropdown (already separate).
